org.crsh.plugins.crowd
Class CrowdAuthenticationPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.crsh.plugin.CRaSHPlugin<AuthenticationPlugin>
      org.crsh.plugins.crowd.CrowdAuthenticationPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationPlugin
public class CrowdAuthenticationPlugin
extends CRaSHPlugin<AuthenticationPlugin>
implements AuthenticationPlugin

Allows to use an Atlassian Crowd serer to authenticate on CRaSH To use it you need to :

  • Define the application on the crowd server side,
  • Use 
    crash.auth=crowd
    in your crash.properties configuration file,
  • Create the 
    crowd.properties
    configuration file     and add it in your application classpath or by defining its path with the system property crowd.properties (
    -Dcrowd.properties={FILE-PATH}/crowd.properties
    ).
